required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of the Alcohol Elimination Effect of TCI711 Probiotic (Bacillus Coagulans) on Adult Individuals
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of the Alcohol Elimination Effect of TCI711 Probiotic (Bacillus Coagulans) on Adult Individuals

brief_summary.textblock: Investigating the possibility of using Bacillus coagulans TCI711 to improve the efficiency of alcohol removal in adult individuals.

primary_outcome.time_frame: 5 minutes after drinking a certain volume of whisky
primary_outcome.description: A breathalyzer will be used for estimating blood alcohol content (BAC) from a breath sample.

primary_outcome.time_frame: 15 minutes after drinking a certain volume of whisky
primary_outcome.description: A breathalyzer will be used for estimating blood alcohol content (BAC) from a breath sample.

primary_outcome.time_frame: 30 minutes after drinking a certain volume of whisky
primary_outcome.description: A breathalyzer will be used for estimating blood alcohol content (BAC) from a breath sample.

primary_outcome.time_frame: 60 minutes after drinking a certain volume of whisky
primary_outcome.description: A breathalyzer will be used for estimating blood alcohol content (BAC) from a breath sample.

primary_outcome.time_frame: 90 minutes after drinking a certain volume of whisky
primary_outcome.description: A breathalyzer will be used for estimating blood alcohol content (BAC) from a breath sample.

primary_outcome.time_frame: 120 minutes after drinking a certain volume of whisky
primary_outcome.description: A breathalyzer will be used for estimating blood alcohol content (BAC) from a breath sample.

primary_outcome.time_frame: 150 minutes after drinking a certain volume of whisky
primary_outcome.description: A breathalyzer will be used for estimating blood alcohol content (BAC) from a breath sample.

primary_outcome.time_frame: 180 minutes after drinking a certain volume of whisky
primary_outcome.description: A breathalyzer will be used for estimating blood alcohol content (BAC) from a breath sample.

arm_group.description: Taking one capsule (containing 10^10 of Bacillus coagulans TCI711) daily for one month

intervention.description: Using Bacillus coagulans TCI711 for one month and implementing alcohol testing at weeks 0, 1, and 4.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy volunteers aged between 20 to 60.
- Systolic pressure below 140
- Score of C-CAGE Questionnaire below 8 (male)/6 (female)
- Prohibiting other supplements before 2 weeks of the study and during the study
- Prohibiting alcohol drinks before 24 hours of the study
- Prohibiting caffeine drinks before 12 hours of the study
Exclusion Criteria:
- Alcohol or drug allergy
- Liver, kidney, cardiovascular, or chronic diseases
- Other severe disorders
- Hypertension
- Pregnancy or lactation
- Already involved in clinical testing
- Other supplements
